content: Water collector system DD-WMK-BI ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Drill stand mounted water collectors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Enables clean drilling overhead Collect up to 100% of slurry Applications Can be used with the WMS 100 water management system or a vacuum cleaner Should be used with water collector holders Should be fixed to a drill stand ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Water collector systems Product information: Set of accessories to collect water with DD 120, DD 150-U and DD 160 For use with: DD 120, DD 150-U, DD 160 Technical Data | Accessory type | Water collector systems | Product information | Set of accessories to collect water with DD 120, DD 150-U and DD 160 | For use with | DD 120, DD 150-U, DD 160 | Additional Accessory Information | Set of accessories to collect water with DD 120, DD 150-U and DD 160 ### ITEMS- 2040915 - Water collector system DD-WMK-BI - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD-WH 3/4 drain hose - 1x Water collector holder assy - 1x DD-WC-SM Water dam - 1x DD-WC-S Water dam - 1x 50 Connecting piece - 1x DD-WMK-BI Tool case assy
